title: Quarterly average daily rate in hotels in New Orleans 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for both 2016 and Quarter have decreased.
Out of all 2 groups, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q2 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q2.
Among all the Quarters, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 194.0 in Quarter Q2 and lowest value 145.0 in Quarter Q3.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2016 and Quarter. In both cases, the Average daily rate in USD have decreased.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for both 2016 and Quarter have decreased.
Out of all 2 groups, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q2 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q2.
Among all the Quarters, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 194.0 in Quarter Q2 and lowest value 145.0 in Quarter Q3.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2016 and Quarter. In both cases, the Average daily rate in USD have decreased.
Quarter Q2 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q2 for 2017.
In Quarter Q2, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q3.
Quarter Q2 and Q3 had the biggest gap of 49.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in USD found for 2016.
Among all 2 groups, 2016 had the gap of 49.0 between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in USD observed in Quarter Q2 and Q3 respectively.
On average, the Quarter Q1 had the highest Average daily rate in USD for all 2 groups 2016, and 2017. Whereas Q3 had the lowest average Average daily rate in USD.
